briefTitle: A Safety and Effectiveness Study of Golimumab in Japanese Patients With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis.
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multicenter, Placebo-controlled, Double-blind, Randomized-withdrawal Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Golimumab Maintenance Therapy, Administered Subcutaneously, in Japanese Subjects With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate safety and effectiveness of golimumab in Japanese participants with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Achieved Clinical Response Through Maintenance-Week 54 Measured Using the Mayo Score
